data.description:
This clean and simple watchface combines both alphabetic and numeric characters for an aesthetically pleasing design that makes telling the time a cinch!

The watchface also comes equiped with a battery indicator so you won't need any additional app!

v1.2 Release (Update pending for iOS users):
- Configuration menu now added
  - Display date in four different formats
  - Invert colour scheme

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.2 Release Notes:
- Configuration menu now added
  - Display date in four different formats
  - Invert colour scheme

- Battery bar and indicator updated (moved position and icon now reflects battery % )

data.title: Hybrid

data.author: Andrey Stoev

changelog.release_notes:
- changed the scope of the battery indicator
- changed menu icon

- support for Pebble Time Round 
- added battery indicator: the line separator acts as a battery indicator 
- changes in the layout 
- changed the BT indicator for Aplite: The line separator changes thickness instead of color 
- code optimization
- Added Bluetooth Connectivity Indicator (Line Separator, changing color on Peblle Time or On/Off on Pebble)
A touch of color for Pebble Time.
Version 2.1 - Bug fix (issue with selecting the correct font for the next layer)

Watchface look change - text is now centered and hours and minutes are divided by line.
Features dynamic font size change during hours "eleven" (11 and 23) and "twelve" (12 and 24) to accomodate the extra length of these words in the Bulgarian Language

data.description:
Bulgarian Language Text Watch.
This is the typical Text Watch using Bulgarian Language and a custom Cyrilic Font.
The Hour font will dynamically change size to accommodate for lengthier Bulgarian words such as the numbers "11" and "12".
A touch of Color on Pebble Time!
The Line separator acts as Bluetooth Connectivity indicator (Red - Connected, Blue - disconnected) and also as a "bar graph" battery meter (shrinking as battery drains)

latest_release.release_notes:
- changed the scope of the battery indicator
- changed menu icon

data.title: Bul Watch

data.author: Marina Sauca

changelog.release_notes:
V-1.0
Fully functional and bug free (I hope!).

data.description:
Official WatchFace of PupGam!

This WatchFace is inspired in the Gurikos, the mascots of PupGam games.

Features:
-Configurable! (use the configure button on your pebble app)
-Switch between the two main Gurikos! Kim (a female Guriko) and Dan (a male Guriko)
-Choose either 12h or 24h 
-Select date format: dd/mm/yy or mm/dd/yy
-Alerts you if bluetooth connection is lost!
-Shows battery %!

latest_release.release_notes:
V-1.0
Fully functional and bug free (I hope!).

data.title: GurikoWatch

data.author: betadecay

changelog.release_notes:
Updated to SDK 4:

Pebble Time, Time Round and Pebble 2 watches are now supported.

data.description:
**UK only**

With CrimeWatch, you can tell if crime is just around the corner.

Using the UK Police API, CrimeWatch tells you about the nearest crime within a 1 mile radius. It tells you what it is and roughly on which street.

Requires GPS and internet connection. Updates automatically every 5 minutes or manually by shaking wrist.

latest_release.release_notes:
Updated to SDK 4:

Pebble Time, Time Round and Pebble 2 watches are now supported.

data.title: CrimeWatch

data.author: Pebble Technology Corp.
data.description: Weather app powered by The Weather Channel provides you with the best forecast whenever, wherever, and however you want it. Your current conditions are front and center on Pebble, and you can see your 3-day forecast by quickly shaking your wrist. With over 200 meteorologists and our patented forecasting technology, we provide you with information you need to enjoy the best day possible.
data.title: Weather - powered by The Weather Channel

data.author: Sam Carton
data.description:
Release The Tension. 

Watch Spindle get wound up.
See Spindle get released with a satisfying burst of angular momentum.
Every minute Spindle is painstakingly wound up for your time-perusing pleasure.

Thank you <3

A Watchface by Sam Carton http://www.samcarton.com.
Banner Pebble image by Matthew Congrove https://github.com/mcongrove/PebbleUI

data.author: Kunveni
data.description:
Neutrino is a sleek, modern watchface that shows the time with seconds and the date. It is descended from our Odyssey watchface.

A configuration window allows you to select white-on-black/black-on-white and day of the week/month.

For a version without seconds, check out our Quark watchface.
data.title: Neutrino

data.author: Dee Jay Skinner

changelog.release_notes: - Decreased the number of seconds from 10 to 5 between alternate views.
- Changed font to bold for the extended weather details.

- Fixed a couple of memory issues
- Added feature: Flick your wrist and see more weather details.
- Fixed bug in how the temperature layer is being recreated.

- Fixed issue with weather temp check. It's now updated every 15 minutes.
- Fixed the bluetooth notification so that it only notifies you after 15 seconds of non-connectivity.

data.description: Very simple watchface with time, day, date, temperature updated every 15 minutes,  bluetooth disconnect notice after 15 seconds and battery life percentage displayed. Also you can flick your wrist to see more weather details. Flick your wrist again within 5 seconds to change to celcius or wait more than 5 seconds and flick to change back to time.
data.title: Clean & Simple 2

data.author: Dee Jay Skinner

changelog.release_notes: - Updated the bluetooth notification so that it will only vibrate if the bluetooth has been disconnected for 15 seconds.

data.description: Very simple watchface with time, day, date,  bluetooth disconnect notice after 15 seconds and battery life percentage displayed.
data.title: Clean & Simple

Added seconds on shake, fixed bug with hour transitions

data.description:
**UPDATED 12/2/15**

Added persistent battery when the watch is being charged

***

Modified the original Douwe Maan Revolution watchface to provide additional functionality.

Added Bluetooth disconnect/reconnect notifications
Added Battery visiblity (shake to display)
Modified Date Format to EU
Right hand corner now displays years instead of seconds
data.title: RE:Evolution

data.author: Kunveni
data.description:
Quark is a sleek, modern watchface that shows the time and the date.

A configuration window allows you to select white-on-black/black-on-white and day of the week/month/nothing. In 24-hour mode, the date is hidden from 20:00 to 23:59.

If you like this format, check out our other watchfaces, Odyssey Big, Galaxy, and Photon Date. For a version with seconds, check out Neutrino.
data.title: Quark

data.author: GrÃ©goire Sage
data.description:
Designed by Sean Kelly.
The minutes close in on the hours on your Pebble. Each minute growing into five while the hours travel around the seconds. An indicator on the seconds tells you that it is AM or PM. Samantha is beautiful and unique.
data.title: Samantha

data.author: dezign999
data.description:
Your pebble is never gonna give you up with this watch face!

â¢ Animates every 15 minutes
â¢ Animates on flick
â¢ Battery Meter
â¢ BT connected indicator dot
â¢ Vibrates on the hour

*New Feature*
Battery conservation mode is activated at < 20%, disabling all animations to preserve your battery.

*Update*
Fixed date display issue when single digits are displayed
data.title: Rick Astley Dance

data.author: Milk Run

changelog.release_notes:
Fix a bug with the hour tread animation
Animate the minute hand.
Add a menu icon.
Add a small indicator for minutes. Buzz on the hour from 9am to 9pm.
try again -- weird issue with app portal

data.description:
This watchface animates two treads to display the time. 

Twitter: @milk_run

The Tredd App watchapp is identical to this watch face except that when you press the select button, it shows the date.
data.title: Tredd Face

data.author: GrÃ©goire Sage
data.description:
Designed by Sean Kelly.
From the future, Dayna will explain time differently on your Pebble. 60 dots unveil the minutes. 12 lines drop down to unfold the hours. The seconds show you are connected to your smartphone.
data.title: Dayna

data.author: GrÃ©goire Sage
data.description:
Designed by Sean Kelly.
Mason perfectly matches your Pebble by being modern but at the same time mirrors a recognisable clock face. An outer line takes you through the hours whilst the centre fills with minutes. A centre dot lets you know you are connected to your smartphone whilst a square lets you know you are disconnected. The current day and date is conveniently displayed at the bottom.
data.title: Mason

data.author: stix

changelog.release_notes: Add bluetooth status, battery icon & charging status.
Fix bug uncovered on v3 firmware.

- hide seconds when doing 1 minute refresh.
- use minute tick events for 1 minute refresh.
- refresh screen on config change.
- simpler logic dealing with refresh intervals.
- use setlocale() to allow strftime() to use localizations.
- other bugfixes.

- Workaround for iOS configuration issues.
- New "Auto" refresh interval, using accelerometer tap events to trigger 1s updates for a minute.
Optimise tick mark drawing by pre-calculating endpoints. Hopefully save some battery!
Add configuration capability with refresh interval, date format and screen invert.

data.description:
Simple. Clean. Boring, really.

Now with configurable refresh interval, including accelerometer-based "auto" setting, date format, black-on-white vs white-on-black toggle, bluetooth status, battery/charge status, and a workaround for iOS configuration issues. Suggestions welcome!

latest_release.release_notes: Add bluetooth status, battery icon & charging status.

data.title: Facile

data.author: Usman Tanveer
data.description: A solar system inspired watch face with minutes and seconds (as planets) revolving around hours (as the sun)
data.title: Solar System Watch

data.author: Markas_K

changelog.release_notes: Fixed a problem getting weather info for cities with longer names
Bugfix: weather not updating on hourly basis. Implemented a delay to wait for the JS init on the phone before sending messages to it
bugfix: clear comm icon after communication is done
Added the ability to configure the date format and display the watchface version on the config page.
Updated to work with openweathermap appid requirement
Updated the BT icon color to white to increase visibility
Added the ability to specify the location for weather manually in the config. iPhone users will have to wait until the next JS bundling to get the functionality.
Version 2.0 with color support for Pebble Time (SDK 3.0)
More tweaks for the temp display
Changes to prevent excessive battery drain on phone and watch
removed Y-axis tap support to prevent excessive refreshes on the new api
v1.7 Javascript fixes identified by CloudPebble
v1.6 Updated to API2.8 and added location capability to appinfo.json

data.description:
A simple watch face showing all the essential information for a busy Pebbler. Included: 
-Time (12 or 24 hour format) 
-Current weather conditions for the location (Celcius or Fahrenheit) 
-Bluetooth state 
-Battery state with percentage 
-Vibrate on phone connect/disconnect 
-Tap to refresh weather 
-And more

NOTE: The watchface Settings page in the Pebble app sometimes comes up blank. As far as i know this only happens on the iPhones. The solution is to uninstall the Pebble app from the phone and re-install it.
data.title: GeekyTime

data.author: Casey L

changelog.release_notes: v1.1 - Added vibration when Bluetooth is disconnected (will not vibrate when launched if Bluetooth is disconnected)

data.description:
A clean watchface that displays the time diagonally across the screen.  

It is based on simplicity and efficiency.  Unlike most watchfaces, only the bottom half is updated once a minute, with the top half only updating on the hour.

- Supports both 12/24 hour
- Battery bar across the bottom
- '!' shows instead of AM/PM if Bluetooth connection is lost
- Vibrates if Bluetooth connection is lost

Email me with any suggestions!

latest_release.release_notes: v1.1 - Added vibration when Bluetooth is disconnected (will not vibrate when launched if Bluetooth is disconnected)

data.title: Quadrant Time

data.description:

5PM... What is their to say? The time that we all count down until, the time we dream of, the time we ditch our suits and ties and partake in the drink of the gods, BEER!

data.author: Josh Goebel
data.description:
Inspired by the Skrekstore Durr (http://skreksto.re/products/durr) this minimal watch face simply shivers briefly every 5 minutes to mark the passing of time.  The face is intentionally blank after start-up.

The vibe is 3 short pulses, so it's different than the built-in vibes, but I still feel this face is best used with notifications off or notifications set to calls only.
data.title: Shiver

data.author: rafasinger
data.description: Cookie Monster is a fun watchface showing Tricky bitting each minute with his jaws. Based on the awesome Nome watchface.
data.title: Cookie Monster

data.author: thedadams

changelog.release_notes: Small update to comply with auto-update requirements.

data.description:
There are two sections of dots: one for the hour and one for the minutes.  If the dots are numbered starting from the top-left of each section, then the differently shaded dot indicates the relevent number for the section.  The screenshot reads 11:16am.  The "hour" section is also a battery level indicator.

The watchface also has a bluetooth vibration alert.  See the website for more details.
data.title: Contrast Dots

data.author: rumo

changelog.release_notes:
- Settings page loading fixed.
- Minutes in last position when seconds disabled fixed.
- 12h mode support (changed in Pebble settings)

data.description:
We Love Numbers.

Screen filled with random numbers. Cursor runs every minute scanning for matching hour and minute digits.

Bluetooth - top left (0 - no connection) Vibrates on disconnection.
Battery level - top right (9 - 100/90%, 8 - 80%,.. Charging indicator)
Date - bottom left (ddmm)
Seconds - bottom right (Optional)

Options (Invert, Animations, Speed).

latest_release.release_notes:
- Settings page loading fixed.
- Minutes in last position when seconds disabled fixed.
- 12h mode support (changed in Pebble settings)

data.title: Number Scanner

month

data.description: Ein Watchface dass die Zeit, das Datum (inkl. Tag) und den Ladestatus anzeigt. Alles in Aargauer, ZÃ¼ridÃ¼tsch. Ich habe das Watchface primÃ¤r fÃ¼r mich gemacht. Wenn genug Requests forhanden sind, werde ich auch noch weitere Dialekte einfÃ¼gen (oder opensourcen).

data.author: adcurtin
data.description:
Modified version of Revolution by Douwe Maan.

I made the watchface display the year instead of seconds to improve battery life, updating the display and processing only once per minute, instead of every second.

It is the American date format.

I have removed QTP. Too many issues on the new firmware.
data.title: Revolution Year

data.author: chops
data.description:
Animates when you tap/shake. 

Supports 12/24hr. 

Battery level & date displayed/revealed  as part of the background when it animates. When no BT the bars above time and below 'stardate' (year.daynum) disappear.
data.title: Sliding LCARS Time

data.author: chops

changelog.release_notes: enable flick for steps via settings
removed flick for steps. changed to a setting.

added steps
consistent graphics on all watches

more settings
fixed missing day bug

data.description:
a very easy to read, normal-aspect version of my 90degrees watchfaces - with the temperature displayed instead of seconds, and an option for steps in place of date.

round or square font. large date, or day and steps. will indicate quiet-time when enabled.

compatible with all pebble watch types.
data.title: 0degreesTemp

data.author: Thomas Satterly

changelog.release_notes:
- Updated to use OpenWeather API 2.5 to fix issues where the weather could sometimes be mishandled
- Added a "refresh" symbol to the bottom-right when the watch is actively trying to fetch weather
- When trying to fetch weather, a request is only sent once every ten seconds to allow for slower connections and reduce battery drain
- Configuration page should now load easier
- Still more battery improvements
- Invert colors and optional second hand on the way!

- Added persistent data for temperature units! Sorry for the delay!
- Improved battery life

Please feel free to email me suggestion and comments, they are always welcome

- Added configuration window to choose temperature units
  **Note** I still have to work out persistent storage, but this is better than nothing for now. Invert colors coming soon!

- Date now changes automatically on day change
- Removed blank settings pane, need to work on my web host...
- Date now updates properly upon a day change, thanks for letting me know!

- Improved performance
-> Second hand never "pauses" now
-> Various tweaks to reduce calculation time
- Reduced battery impact
- Bluetooth disconnect events now allow 15 seconds to reconnected before vibration alert to decrease annoyance factor
- Not the debug build anymore, oops!

data.description:
Simple Analog Digital is a watch face designed to encompass the benefits of a traditional analog and digital watch in one. At only a quick glance, you can gain a rough idea of the time through the analog hands. At a closer look, you have access to the precise time, date, weather, and battery state.

Supports Fahrenheit and Celsius

latest_release.release_notes:
- Updated to use OpenWeather API 2.5 to fix issues where the weather could sometimes be mishandled
- Added a "refresh" symbol to the bottom-right when the watch is actively trying to fetch weather
- When trying to fetch weather, a request is only sent once every ten seconds to allow for slower connections and reduce battery drain
- Configuration page should now load easier
- Still more battery improvements
- Invert colors and optional second hand on the way!

data.title: Simple Analog Digital

White: 8 a.m. â 9 p.m.
Black: 10 p.m. â 7 a.m.

Hope, you enjoy this watchface! :)

For any feedback, please, email me by link below.

<3

-- Svetogor

a digital clock on a rotating 3D cube.

Original animation by z-studios on deviant art:

data.author: Andyco

changelog.release_notes:
V2.0.0
Please let me know of any bugs/errors.  May add vibrate if phone connection is lost

data.description:
It displays the time in binary, using squares to represent the hour/minutes. The left most column is the hour, the next column is the tens digit of minutes, and the rightmost column is the ones digit for minutes.
Please look at source for an explanation on binary time!
Hope you enjoy!

latest_release.release_notes:
V2.0.0
Please let me know of any bugs/errors.  May add vibrate if phone connection is lost

data.description: This is my first attempt at a watch face.  It is based upon the source code of Jack T.'s Casio-WV58DE project.  I myself have the Casio WV58A United States version which is slightly different.  I decided to modify the original code to more closely resemble my WV58A version.

data.description:
update 17 oct: new settings page, new colours, other small graphic changes

The watchface just shows time - with a colourful background for all pebble time watches. Extra Info (day/date/bt/batt) can be displayed via settings. 

In 12hr mode you can choose to have the hour digit centred.

Original concept/design by Elzor.
